details.title: Space–time interference analysis and suppression for airborne passive radar using transmissions of opportunity

kwd: least squares-based adaptive interference cancellation technique

authors.affiliation: Temasek Labs., Nanyang Technol. Univ., Singapore, Singapore
authors.name: Danny Kai Pin Tan

authors.affiliation: Temasek Labs., Nanyang Technol. Univ., Singapore, Singapore
authors.name: Hongbo Sun

authors.affiliation: Temasek Labs., Nanyang Technol. Univ., Singapore, Singapore
authors.name: Yilong Lu

details.abstract: This study presents the space-time snapshot models for the interfering passive signals received by the airborne passive radar which uses a ground-based stationary non-cooperative transmitter. The random range sidelobes couplings of the direct path and of the strong clutter signals into further range cells are major concerns in moving target detection performance. The least squares-based adaptive interference cancellation technique is proposed to efficiently suppress the direct path, strong clutter and Doppler-shifted strong clutter signals present at each antenna element prior to matched filter processing. In mitigating the interfering signals, their corresponding random range sidelobes will also be suppressed by the same amount. Ground-based moving passive radar trials were conducted to validate and ascertain the effectiveness of the proposed adaptive interference cancellation algorithm.

ieee.title: Localization in MISO airborne passive radar through heavy ground clutters
ieee.displayText: Mohammad J. Ahmadi, Rouhollah Amiri, Fereidoon Behnia, "Localization in MISO airborne passive radar through heavy ground clutters", East-West Design & Test Symposium (EWDTS) 2015 IEEE, pp. 1-4, 2015.

ieee.title: Space-time adaptive processing in bistatic passive radar exploiting group sparsity
ieee.displayText: Qisong Wu, Yimin D. Zhang, Moeness G. Amin, Braham Himed, "Space-time adaptive processing in bistatic passive radar exploiting group sparsity", Radar Conference (RadarCon) 2015 IEEE, pp. 0886-0890, 2015.

ieee.title: Signal processing for airborne passive radar
ieee.displayText: Danny Kai Pin Tan, Hongbo Sun, Yilong Lu, Marc Lesturgie, "Signal processing for airborne passive radar", European Radar Conference (EuRAD) 2014 11th, pp. 141-144, 2014.
